entities.description: The estimated number of days smokeless tobacco was used in the past 30 days.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever smoked part or all of a cigar or cigarillo.
The age when the respondent first smoked a cigar.
The year when the respondent first started smoking cigars.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to their estimated smokeless tobacco use in the past 30 days.
Indicates whether the respondent has tried smoking cigars or cigarillos.
Relates the respondent to the age when they first smoked a cigar.
Relates the respondent to the year when they first started smoking cigars.
